title: Question
description: A specific question - e.g. from a user seeking answers online, or collected in a Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) document.

allOf.description: The most generic kind of creative work, including books, movies, photographs, software programs, etc.

acceptedAnswer.description: The answer(s) that has been accepted as best, typically on a Question/Answer site. Sites vary in their selection mechanisms, e.g. drawing on community opinion and/or the view of the Question author.

answerCount.description: The number of answers this question has received.

downvoteCount.description: The number of downvotes this question, answer or comment has received from the community.

suggestedAnswer.description: An answer (possibly one of several, possibly incorrect) to a Question, e.g. on a Question/Answer site.

upvoteCount.description: The number of upvotes this question, answer or comment has received from the community.
